TechVertu > Blog > IT Support > Computer Security Day

Computer Security Day

Computer Security Day is held yearly on the 30th of November to raise awareness for digital security. In a world where information has become our most valuable asset, preserving it personally and professionally is pivotal. We have put together a simple list of basic but essential tips to help you safeguard your computer and sensitive information.

Easy tips to keep your computer safe

TechVertu can help your company to protect your most valuable asset information. Our team of IT experts will make sure that your data and systems are safe and can be fully recovered in case of disaster. Request your free obligation quote today or just call us for a friendly chat.
